name: Minnow
description: Tiny, slender freshwater fish with silver scales and translucent fins.
visualNotes: gill markings arranged like a tiny leafy swirl; faint green chakra shimmer along the dorsal ridge; fast darting silhouette.

name: Bluegill
description: Small round-bodied sunfish with a blue sheen.
visualNotes: cheek patch like a tiny protective plate (like a shinobi guard); orange belly that pulses when excited.
clanMarkings: single vertical stripe behind pectoral fin

name: Carp
description: Large-bodied fish with bronze-gold scales.
visualNotes: long flowing dorsal like a ceremonial sash; barbels end in tiny knot motifs; chest scales engraved with faint seal lines.
clanMarkings: two parallel crest lines across scales

name: Perch
description: Medium fish with green-gold scales and dark vertical bars.
visualNotes: bars resemble wrapped bandages; spiny dorsal looks like a tiny kunai row; compact combat silhouette.

name: Bass
description: Robust fish with large mouth and olive-green body.
visualNotes: broad jaw with subtle carved markings that mimic an armor plate; dark horizontal stripe looks like a headband band.

name: Trout
description: Streamlined fish with spotted scales and a pink streak.
visualNotes: sleek flow lines down the flank like a blade’s shimmer; spots look like inked hand seals.

name: Salmon
description: Sleek silver fish with a hooked jaw.
visualNotes: glistening scales that refract chakra light; faint migrating band like an expedition sash.

name: Pike
description: Long torpedo predator with sharp teeth.
visualNotes: pointed snout like a thrown spear; skin mottled like hunter camouflage; fins edged in dark lacquer.

name: Catfish
description: Bottom-dweller with whisker-like barbels.
visualNotes: barbels resemble braided ropes; flat head with low lantern-like pores; armored cheek plates for digging.

name: Tilapia
description: Rounded freshwater fish with silver-gray scales.
visualNotes: rounded fins like decorative plates; subtle ring pattern behind head like a clan crest.

name: Anchovy
description: Tiny silver schooling fish with large eyes.
visualNotes: school forms tight arrow patterns; each fish has a tiny dark triangular tail mark like a thrown shuriken.

name: Snapper
description: Red-hued saltwater fish with strong jaws.
visualNotes: red scales arranged like battle armor plates; jaw with faint tooth-rune motifs.
clanMarkings: single fin crest with flame curl

name: Mackerel
description: Fast fish with iridescent blue-green stripes.
visualNotes: horizontal lightning-like stripes; streamlined for sudden bursts; dorsal fin like a finned blade.

name: Sardine
description: Small schooling fish with shiny silver body.
visualNotes: reflective flank used to flash signals; schools form spirals like training seals.

name: Eel
description: Long, snake-like body with slimy skin.
visualNotes: skin shimmers with dark ink bands; lateral line glows faintly when charging chakra; body poses like coiled rope.

name: Herring
description: Shimmering silver schooling fish with large eyes.
visualNotes: big reflective flanks used by shinobi scouts to flash signals; elliptical school shapes.

name: Grouper
description: Massive-bodied fish with mottled brown pattern.
visualNotes: bulk and stone-like scales; mouth like a cave entrance; markings resemble clan sigils carved into rock.

name: Flounder
description: Flat, camouflaged fish with both eyes on one side.
visualNotes: sandy mottled skin that takes patterns of nearby seals or scrolls; eye pair looks like a tiny mask.

name: Red Drum
description: Copper-red fish with a black spot near the tail.
visualNotes: single black 'eye' spot like a guardian sigil; scales flash copper when it drums water for alarms.

name: Barracuda
description: Long predator with pointed snout and sharp teeth.
visualNotes: jagged tooth pattern reminiscent of small shuriken; narrow body with high speed lines; dorsal fin like a blade ridge.

name: Haddock
description: Gray-silver fish with a dark lateral line and black spot.
visualNotes: dark spot above pectoral looks like a checkpoint mark; neat fin geometry for realistic drawing.

name: Cod
description: Chunky-bodied fish with chin barbel and mottled scales.
visualNotes: chin barbel looks like a trailing rope talisman; broad fins with notch details.

name: Sea Bass
description: Dark sleek fish with spiny dorsal fin.
visualNotes: dark back ideal for nighttime stealth scenes; spiny dorsal draws like armor spikes.

name: Pollock
description: Silver-gray fish with elongated body and speckled back.
visualNotes: speckle pattern useful for rock camouflage; soft jawline for quick sketches.

name: Marlin
description: Massive predator with a long spear-like bill.
visualNotes: long bill tapering into a ceremonial blade; cobalt back with streaks like wind scars.

name: Tuna
description: Bullet-shaped fish with metallic blue body and crescent tail.
visualNotes: distinct crescent tail and ridged finlets provide silhouette recognition; ideal for dynamic action poses.

name: Swordfish
description: Large predator with long flat sword-like bill.
visualNotes: flat bill perfect for slicing volumes in dynamic art; dark back with metallic flanks.

name: Halibut
description: Huge flatfish with both eyes on one side.
visualNotes: large camo flanks that look like carved stone plates; underside pale like scroll paper.

name: Wahoo
description: Slender predator with vertical blue stripes.
visualNotes: vertical lightning stripes, long jaw; drawn with taut muscles for high-speed scenes.

name: Dorado (Mahi-Mahi)
description: Vivid green, blue, and gold scales with blunt head.
visualNotes: bright color gradients perfect for heroic catches; head appears like a helmet crest.

name: Lanternfish
description: Small deep-sea fish with glowing photophores along its body.
visualNotes: rows of photophores like chakra beads; good reference for biolum color maps.

name: Fangtooth
description: Menacing deep-sea predator with oversized fangs.
visualNotes: oversized canines and huge head — emphasize silhouette; black matte skin to absorb light.

name: Oarfish
description: Elongated ribbon-like fish with silver scales and long dorsal crest.
visualNotes: ancient serpentine body with flowing red dorsal fins like a ceremonial streamer; perfect 'legend' visual.

name: Dragonfish
description: Slender dark fish with glowing lure under chin.
visualNotes: lure looks like a tiny flame-scroll; narrow body with translucent fins — great for eerie compositions.

name: Hatchetfish
description: Tiny, flattened body shaped like a hatchet.
visualNotes: sharp silhouette resembling a throwing tool; silver sheen with upturned eyes — great for stylized linework.

name: Barreleye
description: Transparent-headed fish with tubular green eyes pointing upward.
visualNotes: clear cranial dome with green orb eyes — draw internal organs faintly visible for sci-fi aesthetic.

name: Viperfish
description: Needle-like predator with long fangs and bioluminescent spots.
visualNotes: exaggerated fang silhouettes and glowing side spots — great for dramatic low-light renders.

name: Anglerfish
description: Round predator with massive jaws and glowing lure.
visualNotes: lure shaped like a sealed scroll with rune barbs; grotesque jaw, great for horror-styled character art.

name: Blobfish
description: Soft-bodied fish with gelatinous droopy features.
visualNotes: gooey sagging forms that compress when surfaced; pallid pink tones for melancholy art beats.

name: Gulper Eel
description: Enormous hinged mouth with eel-like body and bioluminescent tail tip.
visualNotes: jaw like an unrolled scroll; thin body trailing off into darkness; small tail light like a signal bead.

name: Cookiecutter Shark
description: Small shark with cigar-shaped body and glowing belly.
visualNotes: glowing belly used for luring; mouth ring has serrated pattern like a seal stamp; useful for scars lore.

name: Greenland Shark
description: Huge sluggish shark with dark rough skin.
visualNotes: pitted skin like weathered armor; slow drifting pose suitable for ominous environmental art.

name: Black Dragonfish
description: Sleek black body with fanglike teeth and bioluminescent organs.
visualNotes: slim form with lit organ clusters like armor lights; ideal for silhouette and negative space art.

name: Deep Sea Smelt
description: Small silver fish with translucent fins and faint glow.
visualNotes: delicate body, faint biolume — useful for ambient crowding in deepwater scenes.

name: Bigeye Tuna
description: Large tuna with oversized eyes and metallic blue scales.
visualNotes: large reflective eyes good for nocturnal designs; ridged finlets for motion blur sketches.

name: Escolar
description: Dark brown fish with oily sheen and sharp fins.
visualNotes: reflective oily skin; deep brown tone good for moody palettes; fin edges sharp like blades.

name: Roughy (Orange)
description: Bright orange fish with rough scales and large eyes.
visualNotes: striking orange for contrast against deep blues; rough scale texture for tactile brushwork.

name: Spookfish
description: Translucent deep-sea fish with long snout.
visualNotes: ghostly translucence and long needle snout; great for horror composition and rim lighting.

name: Stoplight Loosejaw
description: Thin-bodied fish with hinged jaw and bioluminescent red/green lights.
visualNotes: biolume lights arranged like traffic beads; jaw hinge exaggerated for action reads.

name: Tripod Fish
description: Deep-sea fish with long fin rays that extend to form 'legs' resting on the seafloor.
visualNotes: long pedestal-like fins forming tripods; perfect strange silhouette for mythic captures.
